Name: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King
Description: In a world where magic is everything, Asta, a boy who was born with no magic, aims to become the Wizard King.

Name: Ghosted
Description: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent.

Name: The Boogeyman
Description: After their mother's tragic death, a teenage girl and her younger sister face a sadistic presence in their home.

Name: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Description: During the '90s, a new faction of Transformers - the Maximals - join the Autobots as allies in the battle for Earth.

Name: Extraction 2
Description: Back from the brink of death, highly skilled commando Tyler Rake takes on another dangerous mission.

Name: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Description: Miles Morales joins Spider-People across dimensions to protect the Multiverse and its existence.
